basics.name: Jonathan K. Sakkos
basics.label: Staff Engineer, Spatial Genomics R&D
basics.summary: Staff Engineer specializing in scaling manufacturing processes for spatial biology platforms, combining mechanical engineering expertise with biotechnology innovation. Experienced in process automation, CAD/3D printing, and developing automated systems for biotechnology applications.

work.name: Takara Bio USA, Inc.
work.summary: Leading spatial genomics R&D engineering initiatives.

work.summary: Scaled manufacturing processes for spatial biology platforms.

work.summary: Developed and optimized manufacturing workflows for biotech products.

work.summary: Research in synthetic biology, microbial consortia, and bioengineering.

projects.name: Caltrain Performance Tracker
projects.description: Real-time transit performance analytics platform using Python, FastAPI, and PostgreSQL. Automated data collection and visualization of on-time performance metrics.

projects.name: MKV Episode Matcher
projects.description: Smart utility for automatically matching and renaming video files to episode data using fuzzy logic and metadata analysis.

projects.name: AirIQ Air Quality Sensor
projects.description: Custom IoT air quality monitoring solution. Designed and built hardware sensors for real-time environmental data collection.

projects.name: Cat Wheel Speedometer
projects.description: IoT-enabled speedometer and activity tracker for a cat exercise wheel. Tracks speed, distance, and running habits.

projects.name: NuFEB Simulation Platform
projects.description: Contributed to open-source biofilm modeling software. Implemented new features for cyanobacterial modeling and quorum sensing systems.

projects.name: Orthogonal Degron System
projects.description: Engineered controllable protein degradation system for cyanobacteria, enabling temporal control of gene expression.

projects.name: Designer Nanoscaffold Platform
projects.description: Developed visualization tools for tracking nanoscaffold dynamics in live cells using microscopy automation and custom image analysis.

projects.name: Quorum Sensing Toolkit
projects.description: Modular toolkit for implementing quorum sensing circuits in cyanobacteria, enabling cell-cell communication for coordinated behavior.
